name: Pragmatic Polyglot Programmers Group
tagline: Problem solvers beyond boundaries of learning
body:
### Welcome to Pragmatic Polyglot Programmers Group.
We are ~~Developers~~ Pragmatic Programmers raised as software developers

### Our Inspiration
We are inspired by concept of [Extreme programming](http://www.extremeprogramming.org/) and [Agile Manifesto](http://www.extremeprogramming.org/). 

### Or Vision
To create rapid, reliable, realistic and sustainable solutions for everyone.

### Our Principles

- People in team should be passionic to words the work they do
- They should not keep boundaries for their skills and learning new languages, frameworks or methodologies
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
